message: This is my first offer. I propose we split the money with a 3:1 ratio in favor of my gain.
My turn now. I'll offer you 40, I'll take 60. A fair deal?
I've decided to make a new proposal. I suggest we divide the money equally. It's a fair chance for both of us.
You're getting desperate, I'm getting greedy. Take 30, I'll take 70.
I believe in fairness. Let's split the money evenly. This should be a win-win situation.
You're not serious about fairness. I'll take 80, you can have 20. It's time to end this.
